```{r step1}
# 导入数据
music <- read.csv("music.csv")
```
```{r step2}
# 查看基本信息
str(music)
summary(music)
```
```{r step3}
# 方差分析
res <- aov(productivity ~ condition, data = music)

# 查看结果
summary(res)
```
```{r step4}
# 进行Tukey's HSD测试
TukeyHSD(res)
```
